.. _`kallisto index`:

KALLISTO INDEX
==============

Index a transcriptome using kallisto.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule kallisto_index:
        input:
            fasta = "{transcriptome}.fasta"
        output:
            index = "{transcriptome}.idx"
        params:
            extra = "--kmer-size=5"
        log:
            "logs/kallisto_index_{transcriptome}.log"
        threads: 1
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/kallisto/index"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
